entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except a few flurries over southwestern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow overnight. Periods of snow over southwestern sections this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over southwestern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 4 cm over southwestern sections. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
